definitions.definition: the science or practice of the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of disease (in technical use often taken to exclude surgery).
a compound or preparation used for the treatment or prevention of disease, especially a drug or drugs taken by mouth.

examples: an aid convoy loaded with food and medicine

definitions.definition: (among North American Indians and some other peoples) a spell, charm, or fetish believed to have healing, protective, or other power.
examples: Fleur was murdering him by use of bad medicine
